flawed_nl_solution:
The public foundation will have $2500 x 4/5 = $<<2500*4/5=3125>>3125.
So, each of the organizations will receive $3125 / 8 = $<<3125/8=3125/8>>3125/8.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 3125. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
